statements: DELETE FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_id = 100 AND registration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_name = 'John Doe' OR (date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' AND registration_date > '2021-06-30');
DELETE FROM voter_history WHERE registration_status = 'inactive' AND party_affiliation = 'Independent';
DELETE FROM voter_history WHERE voting_year >= 2020 AND party_affiliation = 'Republican';
DELETE FROM voter_registration WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND full_name LIKE 'A%'
DELETE FROM voter WHERE full_name = 'John Doe' AND registration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM voter_history WHERE voter_id = 'e49a5b08-2bd6-4a20-8d21-7c16034b5d3c' AND change_date > '2022-03-15';
